title: Solution plasma assisted Mn-doping: a novel strategy for developing highly durable and active oxygen evolution catalysts
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,789-796
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01398G, Paper
Hao He, Takeshi Matsuda, Akira Miura, Masanori Nagao, Jeevan Kumar Padarti, Tomoya Ohno, Shigeto Hirai
We have revealed that solution plasma assisted Mn-doping is a powerful strategy for enhancing the durability and activity of Co-based OER catalysts, where the OER activity is enhanced by a factor of 11 for Ca3Co4O9.
